messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Articulating
messages.msgSnippet: ... UNLESS!! They learn better how to articulate. Whoever wrote the first sentance, (sherry?) described me. I take things in, my mind digests them, and things
messages.messageBody:
> Some people are incredibly intuitive and spiritual and don't
> >feel the need to articulate their experiences.
>
> And those kind of people won't be much help on a list!

UNLESS!! They learn better how to articulate.
Whoever wrote the first sentance, (sherry?) described me. I take things in,
my mind digests them, and things change. I am not so good at explaining my
beliefs to people. I'm horrible at explaining unschooling in real life. I
just "know" it's right.
But due to many wonderful role models here, I've been making attempts to
articulate my intuitions. I think I'm getting better at it. And I'm learning
more about the whys and wherefores of my beliefs.
Thanks all!
*~*Elissa Jill*~*
unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant people
Loving partner for life to Joey
terrible guitarist, fair singer and happy woman.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
